About

World-Class
Infrastructure

Contemporary yet affordable and sustainable infrastructure.

Inviting Incentives

Malaysia offers the 2nd most competitive R&D incentives in Asia

Tax Benefits 2

  • 100% tax exemption for up to 10 years
  • Allowances on capital expenditure related to the core business of up to 100%
  • Double deductions on R&D expenditure

Tax Benefits 2

  • 100% tax exemption for up to 10 years
  • Allowances on capital expenditure related to the core business of up to 100%
  • Double deductions on R&D expenditure
2nd most affordable office space in ASEAN
3rd most affordable electricity tariff rates for industrial properties
100mbps fibreoptic internet through the Cyberjaya Metro Fibre Network
Collaboration with local university R&D laboratories allow MNCs to innovate with them
City Command Centre that integrates & automates all aspects & functions of the city in order to create an "intelligent city" managed from a single control point
IMPACT, the leading United Nations Information Security agency has been in Cyberjaya since 2009
Strategic location adjacent to the federal administration capital, international airport and major expressways
Sustainable living with low carbon strategies initiatives

Established SMEs

Cyberjaya is home to over 240 enterprises past the startup stage and various initiatives assists in their growth.

Holistic Startup Environment

A vibrant startup ecosystem that encompasses –

Accelerator Programmes
Human Capital
Funding & Mentorship
Collaborative Spaces

Access to the right human capital from internationally-renowned universities with the right skills and innovation based thinking.

  • 45 Malaysian universities are within 100 km of Cyberjaya
  • Malaysia ranked #5 globally for developing, retaining and attracting talent
  • 1 in 10 of Malaysian graduates hold a Master’s degree

Synergistic Partnerships

Cyberjaya has established partnerships with the best in class.

Access to the right human capital from internationally-renowned universities with the right skills and innovation based thinking.

  • Safe city- Low crime rate and 21 CCTV cameras around the city
  • Cyberjaya City Centre – RM6 billion integrated project with commercial, residential & office space development
  • Vibrant commercial areas – numerous shopping malls and F&B outlets
  • Greeneries and lakes- 50% of Cyberjaya's land is reserved for greeneries and public amenities
  • Entertainment - Cinemas, bowling alley, water sports, spa, go-kart circuit, marina, ice skating rink, rock climbing and many more
  • Accessibility- 20-25 minutes to KL City Centre and KLIA through major expressways. Cyberjaya is a stop along the upcoming KL-Singapore 90 min Bullet Train, and 2 stations of the new MRT line.

At Your Service

Cyberview provides assistance in all aspects of your business, including –

Tailor-made incentive packages to suit your company needs
Facilitation in regulatory matter
Business matching and strategic partnerships
Talent facilitation
